meaningMnemonic: You are <kanji>alone</kanji> in what you <kanji>occupy</kanji>. Nobody but you occupies it. You have a <vocabulary>monopoly</vocabulary>. You <vocabulary>monopolize</vocabulary> it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
